item.title: US-212 West/MT-59 North at US-212/MT-59 Split
item.description: US-212 West/MT-59 North at US-212/MT-59 Split in Power River County. Turn right to continue north on MT-59.

item.title: US-212 West/MT-59 North Split
item.description: US-212 West/MT-59 North Split in Power River County. Turn right to continue north on MT-59 to Miles City; continue straight for US-212 west to Ashland.

item.title: US-212 West/MT-59 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-212 West/MT-59 North. Distance to Ashland, Miles City (via MT-59), and Billings.

item.title: US-212 West/MT-59 North at MTS-391 South
item.description: US-212 West/MT-59 North at MTS-391 South in Broadus. Distance marker in background to Ashland, Miles City (via MT-59 North), and Billings.

item.title: US-212 West/MT-59 North - Broadus
item.description: US-212 West/MT-59 North (Park Ave) at Holt St. in Broadus. Turn left on Holt St. to continue on US-212 West/MT-59 North to Miles City and Billings.

item.title: US-212 West/MT-59 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-212 West/MT-59 North. Distance to Broadus, Miles City (via MT-59 north), and Billings (via US-212 west).

item.title: US-212 West/MT-59 North
item.description: US-212 West/MT-59 North in Power River County.

item.title: US-212 West at MT-59
item.description: US-212 West at MT-59 junction. MT-59 north joins US-212 west through Broadus.

item.title: US-212 West Approaching MT-59
item.description: US-212 west approaching MT-59 south to Gillette (Wyoming). Continue west on US-212 West/MT-59 North to Broadus.

item.title: MT-59 South at I-94 East
item.description: MT-59 South at I-94 East to Bismarck (North Dakota). Continue south on MT-59 to Broadus.

item.title: MT-59 South at I-94 Jct.
item.description: MT-59 South at I-94 Junction in Miles City.

item.title: MT-59 South at I-94 West
item.description: MT-59 South at I-94 West to Billings. Continue under freeway for I-94 East to Bismarck (North Dakota).

item.title: MT-59 South - Miles City
item.description: MT-59 South (Main St.) at Haynes Ave. Turn right to continue south on MT-59 and for I-94 access.

item.title: BL-94 West/MT-59 North at MT-59 North Jct.
item.description: BL-94 West/MT-59 North (Main St.) at MT-59 North(7th St.) Jct. Use MT-59 north for Airport and Jordan.

item.title: BL-94 West at MT-59 - Miles City
item.description: BL-94 West (Valley Drive) at MT-59 (Main St.) in Miles City. Turn right on Main St. to continue west on BL-94.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 138
item.description: I-94 east at Exit 138 - MT-59/Miles City/Broadus.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 138
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 138 - MT-59/Miles City/Broadus.

item.title: I-94 East - Miles City Exits
item.description: Miles City Exits on I-94 east. The three exits all show the destination city accessed by that exit. The first exit is to Jordan (via MT-59 north), the second exit is to Broadus (via MT-59 south), and the third exit is to Baker (via US-12 east).

item.title: MT-200 East at MT-59
item.description: MT-200 East at MT-59 South. Taken just outside of Jordan.

item.title: MT-200 East Approaching MT-59
item.description: MT-200 East approaching MT-59 south to Miles City. Continue east on MT-200 for Jordan.
